category.name: Full Text Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_FTS_associated_relation_index
preference.preference_description: Activates the Full Text Search (FTS) engine to perform associated index by object relations during indexing. Valid Values: * false: The Full Text Search (FTS) engine will not check object relations to index associated objects. This is default value. * true: The Full Text Search (FTS) engine will check object relations to index associated objects.
